item1:
群组使用者数居维护
Group user data maintenance
item2:
管理群组适用者数据、是否启用
Manage the group user data , whether to enable it
item4:
有管理权限的使用者
Users with administrative rights
item5:
群组编码、使用者编号
Group ID, User ID
输出
item6:
群组使用者数据
Group user data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的群组或使用者，系统将提示查无此信息
If there is no qualified group or user data, the system will prompt to check the group or check the user information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. Enter Group ID and click Query to query group data
输入群组编码后点选Query查询群组数据
2. If the group exists, you can select the user list on the left and click "Add>>" to add to the group user list on the right. Or select the group user list on the right and click "<如群组存在，则可挑选左边使用者清单后点击”Add>>”加入右边的群组使用者清单；或挑选右边群组使用者清单后点击”< 3. Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
4. Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作
后置条件
item9:
执行S050 Program Authorization by Group确认程序的使用权限
Execute S050 Program Authorization by Group to confirm the use right of the program
备注
